scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a bearded man, likely King David, kneeling in prayer. He is dressed in a royal blue robe adorned with golden fleurs-de-lis and a red lining, suggesting his regal status. His hands are clasped in supplication. To his left, a harp stands ready, hinting at his musical talents. In the background, a richly decorated bed canopy suggests a domestic or royal chamber. To the right, a wooden chest is visible, topped with a golden crown. Through an arched opening on the left, a haloed figure, possibly a prophet or a divine messenger, is seen in a blue niche, gesturing with a raised hand and radiating light. The overall setting is an interior space, possibly a private chamber within a palace or a monastic cell, emphasizing a moment of personal devotion and divine communication.
